languages.text: Среди безжизненных камней и лавовых озер авгуры корабля засекли нечто, напоминающее постройки. Есть нечто неправильное в их очертаниях, однако само их наличие говорит о шансе найти что-то ценное среди руин.

Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.
languages.original_text: Среди безжизненных камней и лавовых озер авгуры корабля засекли нечто, напоминающее постройки. Есть нечто неправильное в их очертаниях, однако само их наличие говорит о шансе найти что-то ценное среди руин.

traits.locale_text: Amid the lifeless rock and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. Something is off about their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests a chance to find something valuable among the ruins.

Amid the lifeless rock and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. Something is off about their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests a chance to find something valuable among the ruins.

Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

languages.text: Zwischen den leblosen Felsen und Lavaseen haben die Auguren des Schiffs etwas entdeckt, das Gebäuden ähnelt. Irgendetwas stimmt mit den Umrissen nicht, doch ihre Anwesenheit allein lässt darauf schließen, dass es in den Ruinen vielleicht etwas Wertvolles zu finden gibt.
languages.original_text: Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Zwischen den leblosen Felsen und Lavaseen haben die Auguren des Schiffs etwas entdeckt, das Gebäuden ähnelt. Irgendetwas stimmt mit den Umrissen nicht, doch ihre Anwesenheit allein lässt darauf schließen, dass es in den Ruinen vielleicht etwas Wertvolles zu finden gibt.

languages.text: Parmi les roches sans vie et les lacs de lave, les augures du vaisseau ont détecté quelque chose qui ressemble à des bâtiments. Bien qu'ils semblent avoir des formes étranges, leur présence suggère qu'il pourrait y avoir des ressources de valeur à récupérer dans les ruines.
languages.original_text: Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Parmi les roches sans vie et les lacs de lave, les augures du vaisseau ont détecté quelque chose qui ressemble à des bâtiments. Bien qu'ils semblent avoir des formes étranges, leur présence suggère qu'il pourrait y avoir des ressources de valeur à récupérer dans les ruines.

languages.text: 生命のない岩石と溶岩の湖の中で、船のオーガーが建造物らしきものを探知した。その輪郭にはどこか不自然なところがある。しかし、存在しているという事実そのものが、廃墟の中に何らかの貴重品が眠っている可能性を示唆している。
languages.original_text: Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

traits.locale_text: 生命のない岩石と溶岩の湖の中で、船のオーガーが建造物らしきものを探知した。その輪郭にはどこか不自然なところがある。しかし、存在しているという事実そのものが、廃墟の中に何らかの貴重品が眠っている可能性を示唆している。

languages.text: Entre las rocas inertes y los lagos de lava, los augures de la nave detectan algo que podría ser un grupo de edificios. Hay algo extraño en sus siluetas, pero su mera presencia sugiere que podría haber algo de valor entre las ruinas.
languages.original_text: Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Entre las rocas inertes y los lagos de lava, los augures de la nave detectan algo que podría ser un grupo de edificios. Hay algo extraño en sus siluetas, pero su mera presencia sugiere que podría haber algo de valor entre las ruinas.

languages.text: 在死寂沉沉的岩地与熔岩湖中，旗舰的俄歇矩阵探测到了某种类似于建筑物的东西。尽管这些建筑物的样子有些古怪，但存在建筑物这件事情表明——废墟中可能掩埋着贵重物品等待发掘。
languages.original_text: Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

traits.locale_text: 在死寂沉沉的岩地与熔岩湖中，旗舰的俄歇矩阵探测到了某种类似于建筑物的东西。尽管这些建筑物的样子有些古怪，但存在建筑物这件事情表明——废墟中可能掩埋着贵重物品等待发掘。

languages.text: Geminin alametleri, cansız kayalar ve lav gölleri arasında binalara benzeyen yapılar tespit ediyor. Silüetlerinde bir tuhaflık olsa da varlıkları, başlı başına harabeler arasında keşfedilecek bazı değerli şeyler olabileceğini düşündürüyor.
languages.original_text: Amid the lifeless rocks and lava lakes, the ship's augurs have detected something resembling buildings. There is something off with their outlines, but their presence, in and of itself, suggests there may be some valuables to uncover among the ruins.

traits.locale_text: Geminin alametleri, cansız kayalar ve lav gölleri arasında binalara benzeyen yapılar tespit ediyor. Silüetlerinde bir tuhaflık olsa da varlıkları, başlı başına harabeler arasında keşfedilecek bazı değerli şeyler olabileceğini düşündürüyor.
